website_summaries.verdict: Smaller dogs and cats travel in style and comfort, thanks to this highly-rated, airline-approved carrier that folds out – especially welcomed on long flights and layovers.
pros: Pockets in carrier for food or toys
Padded strap won't dig into the pet parent's shoulders when carrying
Larger sizes available for bigger pets
Folds easily for storage, and pops right back out when ready to use
Removable pad is easy to clean
cons: May be too tall for some seats if trying to include with carry-on luggage, so verify with your airline before flying

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for bigger dogs
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars. Took 1 away because a metal bar On the top pokes out when I pick my dog up. I have to hold it so it doesn’t poke my dog in the eye if he moves around, but he is heavy for this- 24 lbs. Why I love this otherwise: it EXPANDS! I expand one side to allow my dog to get in and turn around. He’s too big to turn around when the sides are not expanded. I love this thing for my “large for a carry-on” dog!
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: A Review From My Cats "Olliver" & "Max"
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my two cats who are gonna use this to actually give you their review so here is goes... Meow, meow, meow, Hiss, Hiss, Meeeeeoooowww, meow, purrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. Which is basically My cat Olliver telling you that " This Hut is Mine, and if my lil brother Max thinks he is going to lay his butt down in here, I will Rip his Weave Out". Then he continued to say "Thank You, I love, love, love my fold out hut with the beautiful comfortable microfiber floor padding"... So Worth the Price, We may just have to buy MAX his Own!.... Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Vinyl Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier for flying
customer_reviews.text: So, the sides open up but my hubby let our Shih Tzu travel like this. On her return trip, she lounged completely inside with one side extended. It's a sturdy little carrier. Pretty easy to manage. Stahli is about 10lbs ... she is a little smooshed when all closed in but once a side or both sides are open she managed to even get belly up. Good purchase, good carrier and fits under airline seats no problem
customer_reviews.author: TXEggplant

customer_reviews.title: Fit under airline seat
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting the zippers to zip and unzip, which is inconvenient when you've got an already anxious animal in there. Be aware that if you want to expand the sides, you need to also unzip it from the inside, which you'll want to do before you put your pet in. My 9 lb cat fit, but there wasn't a ton of room. It fit well under the airline seat in front of me, which was my main purpose of getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. 12.5h flight
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Helped my cat stretch on the really long 12.5h super economy flight on AEROFLOT Russian airlines in the very back of the plane. He slept in it no problem. One thing I’ll advise is to put a little blankie over the roof so your pup or kitty is not distracted or bothered. Also break it in early - I put it in the center of the room with his toys all opened up and he himself started going inside and playing / lounging. Ideally pre-2 weeks time, but 1 week is also enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carried 2 adult male cats across the US aboard the airplane with us
customer_reviews.text: We purchased an additional seat aboard the plane to bring our pet family (2 dogs + 2 cats) when we moved from the West to the East Coast. This carrier was able to fit under the seat (per regulations) and then once we took off I was able to expand both sides and it gave them plenty of room... Now we use for Vet visits. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: GardenGal

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: This I see a very nice carrier. I bought this as I have two kitties. I gave it three stars because if you have a cat that doesn't like going to the vet the cat can get out before you get it zipped closed, it requires two people . Also opening out the sides is a little inconvenient. You have to unzip the outside, then open a zipper on the side so you can reach in to unzip the side floors. The smaller carrier is more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Empty Nest

customer_reviews.title: Best for pet comfort on tiny restricted plane seating like Allegiant.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as the picture shows. Since the airline we travel with requires a very small size carrier we had to buy this one. Why? With a regular carrier our dog and cat would be required to lay down like a sphinx the whole trip. This carrier allows them to stretch out and even turn around when the flaps are zipped down. Yet they still fit within our feet.
customer_reviews.author: OkieRo

customer_reviews.title: Expandability is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: We have flown several times across the country with this carrier and never had a problem. During the flight and while we're waiting in the terminal, we expand it so our cat has extra room to spread out. It's sturdy, but has some give so it can be shoved underneath airplane seats. The only minor thing it is missing is a way to connect the two hand straps to carry it from just my hand as opposed to slung over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for air travel!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is great! The carrier has a soft removable bottom and expands on both sides, with fur lining as well. This carrier works great for airline travel, especially Alaska Airlines! I just used this carrier to take my cat home with me on Alaska Airlines and it fits perfectly under the seat and leaves enough room to extend one of the sides so the animal has some extra room. The carrier also has a slit on the sides so that the carrier can attach to any luggage for easier carrying. Overall, great carrying case and I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect even for a big kitty!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so concerned about my very large (not overweight, just generally large) 13 lb kitty fitting comfortably into a carrier that met airline restrictions and I'm happy to say she fits into this one perfectly. It's a little snug, but she loves it and has just enough room to move around when it's zipped up. When the expandable sides are open she can stretch all the way out. The carrier design itself is very well made, sturdy so that it doesn't collapse on itself, and the material is very nice. I don't see her easily being able to tear the mesh as it seems fairly heavy duty. Money well spent!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Fits under airline seat (middle)!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 pound cat was fine in this carrier, as long as one side was expanded. The carrier with one side expanded fit perfect under the middle seat area. We flew on Alaska Air for a 5.5 hour flight across the country. She was in the carrier all day (~11 hours). I slung the carrier with her over my back while I was walking with other luggage. Excellent carrier for airline travel that also meets under seat specs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Bowley

customer_reviews.title: Great customer Service and outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute and it folds out so large. I can't wait to use it on planes. I use this carrier in the car with a little maneauvering and I let my puppy climb out of the opening opposite of the pocket so he can breathe well. The leash is a little cheap but it works for now. My first carrier was broken at the seam but Petsfit replaced it right away and I was able to get a brand new carrier that all the seams are perfect and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. My cat is very happy with the size!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Took my 15 year old Russian blue mix cat on a 3000 mile journey to avoid Hurricane Irma.. At first he fought me and cried.. By the end of the second day, he fought me and cried when I tried to take him out of his catio with 2 sides expanded. I used the leash clip to keep him from crawling under my legs whilst I was driving.. The carrier worked very well for the trip and was very easy to zip up to a single wide and carry him along.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Can Wait.

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I ordered something similar to this before, but unfortunately one of my cats peed in it due to anxiety during our move so I needed to find a replacement. I love this carrier. I bought two of them for each of my cats. It’s a cute bag and the material is of high quality. It’s airline approved and I love that I am able to expand the sides to make traveling easier for my cats. Sometimes I leave it open around the house and the cats use it as their cave/bed. I highly recommend for traveling or just in general. Comes with adjustable shoulder strap and had pockets. Easy to assemble/dissassemble.
customer_reviews.author: ramannoodles

customer_reviews.title: A well made product. Performed as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made carrier. Some of the negative reviews seem to be referring to an entirely different product. The fabric, stitching, zippers, strap and strap hooks are all of good quality. This is for very small animals, though. We have an 8 lb PomChi (pomeranian/chihauhau) and I would not have put a larger animal in here. But for small pets, it's adequate. The fold out sides seemed to help him feel less constrained. The plush base insert seemed like a comfortable surface and kept the bag "square" while carrying through several airports. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K Haws

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I used this to take my two cats ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I used this to take my two cats on an airplane from Korea to America, a 10+ hour flight using Delta. The cats were able to spread out. Occasionally we let the cats pop their heads out of the top. We got them back in easily. One cat scratched a little at it but it remained in tact. Great buy for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ziel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and my cat was much more comfortable with being put inside this than her original carrier, which did not have the structure this has. It's really sturdy, won't collapse around her like other bags. This will make our lives a lot easier on the few occasions she needs to go anywhere with me! I bought this in case we needed to evacuate during a hurricane and think it was the best option of the many available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety issue: the zippers don't lock on their own ...
customer_reviews.text: Safety issue: the zippers don't lock on their own - no clasp or lock. Very bulky as well. The seller said the locks are safe but my cat could put her paw and open it.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall, love that it expands!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best pet carrier I could find to take my two cats with me to France. It worked so well, and it was great for layovers, so that the cats could have a little bit of extra space. The only problem I had was that the rods that are in the corners of it to keep its shape came out when I tried to wash the carrier, and now they poke out when I’m carrying the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Sears

customer_reviews.title: Room to Relax
customer_reviews.text: Zips up to a three ventilated carrier for walking and then each side unzips in the car for wonderful stretching room. Cat was very content - WAY better than in a plastic crate. She could move around, lie down, stretch, and see everything and that made her very happy. for the long drive.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: which worked perfect. The only downfall was my cat could not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is made very well and big enough to put a small litter box on one side. I used a small disposable baking pan, which worked perfect. The only downfall was my cat could not stand up in it because it's not very high. He could move over into the litter box and then crawl back to the middle or other side. I would of not been able to use it for my larger cats that weighted 12 to 19 lbs. I used it for my old cat that weighs around 8 lbs and he slept the entire way in it on a long road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Sturdy, nice colors. When the two side canopies are out it lowers the height from the weight of the sides being down. I dont think the inner zippers for the canopy sides are an issue like some people reviewed. They seem to work easily enough. And it fits the Alegiant airline requirements. Of 9"Height.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Expandable sides are really fantastic!  Excellent design!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier!!! I couldn't have traveled via airline with my giant Maine Coon without the zip-out expansion sides... really awesome design. Just *barely* fit under my airline seat and gave my Maine Coon all the room possible while allowing me to carry him onboard! Might not fit on all airlines, but it saved my day! I was able to zip out one expandable side while airborne to give my huge cat some much-needed room while enroute on a cross-country flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carrier is just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was sure it would be too small, but it turned out fantastic - both for the air travel and now I keep it in the car and use it when I can take my pet into a store but not on a lease. Its light weight and the should handle is comfortable for me as well. Very well made too. My dog is 13 lbs and its just right!
customer_reviews.author: Moonglow808

customer_reviews.title: Great size!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog cannot fit in these bags normally. He is 20lbs but has long legs. The two open side panels make all the difference. Now he likes to hang out in this bag at home, goes in there on his own to cozy up. Sticking a little blanket in there makes it more comfortable for him. Glad we found this carrier!
customer_reviews.author: Pali

customer_reviews.title: SOUTHWEST FLIGHTS ARE THE BEST WITH THIS GUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs over the weight limit on southwest, but they fit in this, and i put them in and they fly well~ I have a pug and an italian greyhound. Follow one of the comments below that talked about taking out the structure to fit underneath the seat as it won't fit under the seat stock.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Great for our first time flyer!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15 lb beagle-cavalier mix. This was our first time flying with our little guy and I was so nervous. Having the right carrier was super important to me - I wanted to make sure he was safe and comfortable. This carrier worked out perfectly! He was able to lie down comfortably when everything was zipped up, and then the expandable sides were a big hit while we were in the air. We also loved the option to put him on top of the rolling luggage while walking through the airport. Overall, very happy with this decision.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier and allows for both a tight sqeeuze in an airplane and plenty of room with expandable sides in the airport!
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking my dog overseas and this was a great investment. The fact that it expands makes it awesome for my furry friend although it's already pretty spacious. A fabric carrier is much more handy than a hard covered carrier since the space under the seats of airplanes can be quite small. My dog seems to enjoy soft covering that extends with the expandable sides too. The only downside is that there isn't more pockets to hold extra things in.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for Avianca with Pet
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! This bag was very useful, good material and spacious. My Yorkshire fit comfortably and we made it to USA from Brazil with no problem. The size was perfect for my flight with Avianca. He was a bit tense in the beginning, so after the connection I had a empty seat beside me and I put the bag there and he was happier to see I was there and he slept peaceful. So, getting a seat that has a chance to be empty is a tip.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable in the airplane!
customer_reviews.text: Able to use for Delta flights! Once we got our seats just opened one side, opened another later. Our cat really hates small space like pet carriers but had been so calm during 6 hrs flight... a bit upset when the plane landed on though. Inside of the carrier is fluffy and she started being comfortable once she understood no one was gonna get her out. Wish luck to everyone looking for a carrier for flights!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Lee Riven

customer_reviews.title: Durable travel case
customer_reviews.text: Because of the size and foldable sides, it seems a bit smaller on the inside when the sides are folded up. However, even after several attempts to get out and scratch at the openings, the mesh doesn’t show any signs of wear or tear. When not folded, it’s very spacious. Great for small animals and to meet smaller airline requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Ertl

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Airplane!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller cat carrier for taking my cat on an airplane. While this model is small, it is perfect for the airline requirements and I was able to open up one of the sides on the plane to make my cat's flight more comfortable! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: The best carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it! It’s her safe place even when at home. The double expandable option works best for us but we often only expand just one side. We get lots of compliments on her carrier and couldn’t be happier with its quality and sturdiness. The lining is incredibly soft—I think that’s why our pup loves spending so much time in there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier but it arrived with one zipper broken and I could never get the supplier to answer. I need the carried ASAP so I was stuck with one broken zipper
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and comfortable. I bought this to fly with my then 5lb Shih-Tzu/Maltese puppy. I used it again a year later once she was fully grown (7lbs), and she still fit perfectly. I would not recommend for dogs larger than 10lbs or so.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong. My kittens play all day on/in it. The best play is when the top is open, when closed they sit right on it and it does not collapse. My kittens are 7 weeks old and their claws are all over the thing but not a scratch to be seen on it (compared to my chairs and sofa covers who are singing their last song) I have seen rewiews saying that when expanding the carrier and unzipping the soft walls there is only a zipper from inside but it is inside and outside! The only sad thing is that when taking down the sides they are a little too small compared to the expanded area.
customer_reviews.author: Lauridsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our Trip
customer_reviews.text: We are about halfway through our cross-country drive to our new home and this carrier has been a god send for our cat. It’s so spacious and has lots of room for her to sprawl out. We got a pen for her to sleep in at night, but she prefers to spend it in this cozy carrier. It’s a must have for long trips like ours 👍
customer_reviews.author: snow.mantis

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it so much she uses it as a bed.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cat carrier and my kitty really loves it! I bought it because it was the correct size to fit under the seat on planes, while still being able to expand it and provide extra room. While I haven't needed to use it on a plane yet, I have used it for a vet visit and car rides and it is well made and sturdy. My kitty loves it so much that she just uses it as a comfy bed, which makes me feel good knowing its a good spot for her to feel cozy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Great pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: We used on 3 flights and our pomeranian was very happy in the carrier. The expanding side wall sections are amazing. Zippers worked well
customer_reviews.author: Jay Yanamura

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a rabbit carrier. It’s sturdy, easy to use with lots of ventilation. The only reason I wouldn’t give 5 stars is that the side fleece doesn’t appear to be removable for cleaning. So it’s spot cleaning should you’re animal I’ll decide to relieve his/herself inside the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Kelli Manring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived in good condition. Excellent bag and worth the price for sure. I am buying the bag to train my fur baby as we will be travelling soon. Saw a lot of good reviews and indeed the bag is very light, quality is very strong and so much space when it is expanded. The most important is that my baby is loving it, altho in the picture, her claws are kinda stuck. :p
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: THE nicest pet carrier and I'm thrilled about the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had soft-sided pet carriers in the past, and all they do is collapse in on themselves. Further, the interior is normally one thin pad, not very comfortable I'd imagine. This one has thick cozy fleece on bottom and 2 sides, and the entire structure - once you zipper closed the back side - is super sturdy. The zippers glide smoothly, the panels extend as promised and give plenty of room to stretch out. The materials are really very nice too. I couldn't be much more happy about this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cipriano

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Perfect to fly with a cat
customer_reviews.text: I put 5 stars to the comfort just because it's very small...but it's extendible! For the rest it's top. Sturdy and easy to carry, on the shoulder ot on the luggage. I used it to carry a big cat on a 13 h flight. It's the only one I found that matches the size required by Alitalia.
customer_reviews.author: Boldi Donella

customer_reviews.title: Beats Sherpa!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is for our Border Aussie puppy to fly and so far he loves it. Compared to a Sherpa bag ($90) this beats it by far. The extendable sides, harder bottom, and leash hook really make it so much better than the more expensive Sherpa.
customer_reviews.author: Katlynn McKean

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little carrier! There are so many options to make this larger with the addition of high quality zippers. The fabric and construction are evident as you examine it from all angles. We are taking our 7 lb. toy poodle across the country in this carrier in the next week. We have been having her get use to going into the carrier and exploring around. We purchased the medium size which gives her plenty of room to stand and turn around while abiding by the measurements associated with airline regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Elbee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Travelled with my Dog for the first time and this was so convenient. My dog was very comfortable. Easy to carry around. Love the way it expands and the way it collapses when no longer in need.
customer_reviews.author: Ligia B.

customer_reviews.title: My puppy seemed happy,  scared or cramped.
customer_reviews.text: I only have done a 'practice' run w/ the carrier. My puppy seemed happy & comfortable. The fold out is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but too many zippers
customer_reviews.text: Its really sturdy. But theres kind of too many zippers which makes the carrier heavier. Little less zipper will make traveling easier with less weight especially during airplane carry one.
customer_reviews.author: Minkyung

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable for small/average size cats!
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier! I took my cat on a long flight in this carrier and she’s not typically a cat who likes long journeys. She was comfortable right away and the expandable side compartments let her lay down for the flight. Now she likes it so much that she chooses to sleep in it when we’re in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zippers on a carrier with lots of zippers.
customer_reviews.text: The carrier looked great, however I had to return it because one of the many zippers on this carrier was already broken. Not a great sign for the quality of the bag considering there are so many zippers on it. It also looked like this carrier had been delivered to someone else and poorly repackaged in a taped up plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Krouse

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and good quality dog carrier. higher recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Palace
customer_reviews.text: Lucky loved his travel crate. He was in it from Singapore to the US. Fit perfectly under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky_Cycles

customer_reviews.title: Kiddies have already moved into it at home
customer_reviews.text: Will be using this and one more to transport three older cats between Minneapolis and Orlando. Getting them used to it now. They LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schwantz

customer_reviews.title: A great "kitty condo" for your cat...
customer_reviews.text: My cat has never been happier! We needed to transport our cat and it broke my heart to put him in the small carrier I used to bring him to the vet. This was the perfect solution. It's SO cool how it unfolds into a "kitty condo". I will feel much better when we will very soon have to transport him a long distance
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great carrier, make sure to check your airlines policy on height/width/length.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for travelling by plane with my special needs cat. He was able to stretch out when the sides were down and it fit well under the seat even with those sides down.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Well made, except
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made carrier. The only thing wrong is when you open "one" side up the middle (main) is not real sturdy. Other than that it has zippers everywhere so you can open any part of it. A very good carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Easily expandable to make more room for your ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Easily expandable to make more room for your pup. Once the sides are all zipped up it fits perfectly under your seat on the airplane. I was pleasantly surprised that it can fit horizontally under the plane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY,BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT..COVERS SO MANY WAYS OF NEEDS.MY DOG LOVES HIS EVERY DAY BED.BEAUTIFUL,COMFY,GREAT QUALITY.WORTH EVERY PENNY.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Good alternative to the stuffy traveling bag. Dog prefers the added space.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have two papillons that I needed to fly with us across country. I got the medium size carriers. It was a tight squeeze under the seat on the delta flight, but it worked. The carriers are very well made and quite cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Noneofyourbusiness

customer_reviews.title: Jet blue approved
customer_reviews.text: It fits Jet blues requirements. Queenie is 6 lbs n fits nicely. The extendable sides are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great expandable carrier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter to transport her 2 cats & she & they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship is great. The expandable sides allow the cat to lay ...
customer_reviews.text: Workmanship is great. The expandable sides allow the cat to lay flat and stretch out. It is too short for the cat to stand, but I knew that before ordering it; that is the fault of airline rules on height. Nice carrier!
customer_reviews.author: AnimalHouse

customer_reviews.title: Well made carrier but not fond of design. Could ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made carrier but not fond of design. Could not find a way to close it up for transport without opening & exposing cats for escape.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Way to small
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates this thing with a passion. Got it so I could take her in a plane. She was stressed because even as a small cat she could barely fit. Unless you HAVE to get it don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: audgirl888

customer_reviews.title: Great for Alaska airlines
customer_reviews.text: We flew on Alaska to Honolulu feom California! I was worried it would be too big but it was a good fit. It was a little snug however when it was safe to do so I opened up the side so our lucy had space to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: saul ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item!. Nice color combination (gray with blue trim) and excellent design with all functions, as well as well made in the sense that certain parts are strengthened by double-line or cross stitching, for example. I would want to buy another one, the same color combination, but in a bigger size (L), if it becomes available in the new version.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: The gray is super cute and they even enjoy lounging in it with ...
customer_reviews.text: The 19x12x12 works perfectly for large-framed cats. The gray is super cute and they even enjoy lounging in it with the expanders out at home!
customer_reviews.author: StephyB

customer_reviews.title: Extra space
customer_reviews.text: I really love it!!I'm gonna take my cat travel abroad at May and this one is exactly the carrier I want!My cat is 9lb medium size and she can stay inside freely. I think it is not so necessary to buy the double side one, one side it big enough I think, for the coach.
customer_reviews.author: JIEU

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat chooses to get in this. Every time she see it she jumps right in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is great! I was very satisfied! And so was my cat. He loves to be in it even if we are at home and not traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for small puppies
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is okay, but has started to fall apart within he first 2 months. I've found more than a few design flaws. Would not buy again, but a decent product for a small puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Pet carrier is spacious and well made. Quite versatile for travel with the expanding sides. I also use it as a pet crate for sleeping when I travel. My pet is very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing product, exactly as shown in the pictures, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shahar A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks perfect for so long
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it 2 days ago, and today it showed up here at my door in Norway! Would never believe the shipping went that fast. I’m looking forward to try it with my two Ragdoll kittens expected in June. I guess it will fit them also when they are getting big, thanks to the expandable sides. Plenty of place. Looks perfect for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Silje Bronken

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case! Perfect for our teacup poodle, and quality exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality! Although my puppy doesn’t want to go insde right now. But I love the quality and it is worth for price. The one thing is it is a little bit heavy than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these carriers for air travel with my cats. They're designed and built wonderfully. The size dimensions are as stated - perfect for airlines with strict requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and service
customer_reviews.text: Well made, lots of options... 10lb doxie loves it! Great Value and service.
customer_reviews.author: Phil T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for flying!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one as KLM Airlines only accepts ridiculously low pet carriers. This is perfect as it is low but still spacious. I just hope it will be okay weight-wise as my cat weighs about 4kg. Thanks a lot! Great first time Amazon experience! Greetings from Korea
customer_reviews.author: Eline

customer_reviews.title: Cats choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carrier bag for my persian. Complies under the spirit airlines dimensions and is cuter in person then online. She wandered in there by herself!
customer_reviews.author: Neilcy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Airline transport
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier, I have to fly with my cat in a few weeks I hope it works well. It's very soft and expandable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Black

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am adopting a kitten and this is PERFECT!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made and the zippers would not zip, none of them.
customer_reviews.author: Della Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! She likes to just hang out in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: looks great, and very functional
customer_reviews.text: really well made, looks great, and very functional. lots of zippers and pockets to expand. fits my 13 lb shih tzu.
customer_reviews.author: Divine Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I travelled with my cat form Costa ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I travelled with my cat form Costa Rica to Paris and this bag made the trip easier for us. The fabric on the inside is soft and cozy, made my cat feel warm and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Fournier P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good to travel, but those opening sides were not useful for us
customer_reviews.author: DSsss

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, my cat likes it so much he ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, my cat likes it so much he uses it as a bed every day, so no complaints if we need to take him somewhere in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier!! Just wasn't the right size for my pup!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cats love it and it made traveling with them much easier
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it, well designed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very roomy cat carrier when the sides are opened. Cats can see through screen and don't seem to mind being inside like some of the other hard sided carriers I've used. I left it out in the room unfolded with the door unzipped so the cats could get used to it. 2 of my cats regularly sleep in it. Each takes one of the side 'porches' and takes a nap. I'm amazed they were attracted to it.
customer_reviews.author: TechConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great sturdy kitty carrier. The zippers are a little fickle but, me and my cat are a lot happier with this one
customer_reviews.author: Mary Exner

customer_reviews.title: it shows room for 2 cats our cats are fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: it shows room for 2 cats our cats are fairly small and not nearly enough room should be at least 2 or 3 inches taller and wider
customer_reviews.author: don't fish

customer_reviews.title: A purr-fect travel carrier for your furry friends, up to 12# cats or pups
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flexible carrier for both flights on airlines and daily use if your furbaby loves to travel in the car. My Tinkerbell absolutely loves to ride and hops into her carrier to let me know that she is ready to ride. The fold down sides are fully padded and allow a lot more space when you are not "under foot", especially during plane trips. The breathable sides are designed to be both comfortable and safe as well as eliminate most of the feeling of being restricted. If you have never tried a dedicated pet carrier other than the hard sided type, this is the perfect place to start - and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved the room
customer_reviews.text: We had to travel across country so it was nice to have room for our cat to stretch out. Had to keep the dog from trying to sit on her though! lol The carrier is sturdy and since it zips / folds back up I can take her to the vet in it as well. So happy she had a good trip in this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Giberson

product_meta.title: Petsfit 2 Sides Expandable Carrier
product_meta.description:
Size:S:16"x10"x9"| Color:Light Grey

Storefront Link: www.amazon.com/shops/petsfit

Basic information:



Fabric: 600D X 600D Oxford cloth



Lining: 230D polyester



Mesh: hexagonal

 

Zipper: metal slider and nylon teeth and durability is 10000 times



Dimension: Small: 41cm x 25cm x 23cm Medium: 46cm x 28cm x 28cm Large: 48cm x 30cm x 30cm

 





NOTE: ALL MATERIAL IS NO HARM TO PETS.







Designs and Functions:

 

1. Several mesh designs makes it good ventilation.



2. Expandable area let pet have more space to move and increase air circulation.



3. Wire frame in both sides support the carrier to be more stereo.



4. Nylon woven tape hand and shoulder strap is strong to carry.



5. Two zipper doors are easy to access.



6. Soft fleece mat is comfortable for pets.



7. Side-pockets can store small goods.







Warranty:



1. Petsfit adhere to Amazon Return Policy.



2. Within 30 days, any quality problems, we will take full responsibility.



3. Any damages happened during shipping period, we will burden the cost.







Attention: Please kindly check with airline company before you travel to avoid fly troubles.
feature_bullets: Petsfit carrier has extra space provided for long rides on planes.ONLY FOR SMALL PET
Dimension:16"Long,10"Wide,9"High,17.5" Wide on the bottom when the porch fold out.
Perfect size for small dogs like Chihuahua,for cats up to 7 pounds.Please measure your pet.
Petsfit dog airpline carrier has big pocket and nice removable mat.
Folds down completely flat for storage.
